import pyspark.sql.functions as F

my_grocery_list = (
    ['Banana', 2, 1.74],
    ['Apple', 4, 2.04],
    ['Carrot', 1, 1.09],
    ['Cake', 1, 10.99]
)

df_grocery_list = spark.createDataFrame(
    my_grocery_list, ['Item', 'Quantity', 'Price']
)

df_grocery_list.printSchema()

#Root path var
adls_path = "abfss://learning@ivsdatastorage.dfs.core.windows.net/DataAnalysisPythonPySpark"

#Load text file to data frame
df_tv_sched = spark.read.text(adls_path + "/data/broadcast_logs/BroadcastLogs_2018_Q3_M8_sample.CSV")

#df_tv_sched.show(5, 500)

#Parse csv to data frame
logs = spark.read.csv(
    path = adls_path + "/data/broadcast_logs/BroadcastLogs_2018_Q3_M8_sample.CSV",
    sep = "|",
    inferSchema= True,
    header = True,
    timestampFormat = "yyyy-MM-dd")

logs.printSchema()

#logs.show()
